measured_by: proportion of risky choices in the decisions-from-experience task
justification: "The primary dependent variable was the proportion of risky choices in the final 3 blocks," indicating that this proportion was used to quantify participants’ risk preferences.

measured_by: proportion of reward-maximizing choices on catch trials
justification: Catch trials served as a "manipulation check that participants had learned the contingencies," and participants with fewer than 60 % reward-maximizing choices were excluded, showing this proportion was the index of learning.
